about_the_game:
The kingdom of Coela is broken and fragmented, ravaged by war and chaos. Its people face constant threats and rising dangers, with no one to protect them. To restore balance, someone must take on the trials ahead.

Ashcrown Gauntlet is a turn-based strategy game built around tactical gameplay. Assemble a team of champions, face escalating challenges, and progress through the Crowns in a roguelike structure where every decision matters. Victory depends on your ability to think strategically and adapt to new threats.

Key Features

  • Strategic, Champion-Based Gameplay
    Select a team of champions, each with unique abilities and spells. Build your strategy, combine abilities, and adapt to each battle’s challenges to succeed.

  • Turn-Based Depth Meets Roguelike Replayability
    Every run presents a fresh set of challenges with randomized battles and scaling difficulty. Your ability to adjust your strategy will determine your survival.

  • Progress Through the Crowns
    Battle through multiple Crown levels, each increasing in difficulty. Boss encounters will test your limits, and conquering the Ashcrown unlocks endless challenges for experienced players.

  • A Focused Tactical Experience
    This game focuses on core strategy and gameplay depth, offering an experience designed for players who enjoy deliberate, challenging tactical decisions.

  • Endless Possibilities
    Try new team combinations, items, and strategies with each run. The variety of champions and gear ensures no two games are the same.

Will You Claim the Ashcrown?

Coela’s fate hangs in the balance, and the trials ahead will test even the sharpest tacticians. Assemble your champions, master the battlefield, and climb through the gauntlet to prove your worth. Do you have what it takes to conquer the Ashcrown?
